timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_container
| { { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
    | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum()
| outer_join 0
| div
| top 5
| scale "%"

fetch k8s_container
| { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes }
| union
| align next_older(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum()
| top 5

fetch k8s_container
| { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
| union
| align next_older(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum()
| top 5

fetch k8s_container
| { { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes }
    | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum()
| join
| sub
| top 5
